articles.content: Ravindra Jadeja batting at No. 5 was the last straw. "Virat Kohli will go to any lengths to prove that his decision of not playing R. Ashwin is justified", was one of the tunes the fans were playing … [+4290 chars]

articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: A World Cup every two years? The pros and cons of FIFA chief Arsene Wenger's blueprint - ESPN India
articles.description: Can you imagine a major international tournament held every year? The idea is closer to becoming a reality thanks to FIFA's Arsene Wenger.
articles.content:
Can you imagine a world where there is a major international tournament held every year? The idea is closer to becoming a reality than you might think.
